name: Demon's Edge
description:
Demons'Edge (Three.js)

Web: HTML5, Three.js, Coffeescript and Chaotive framework

Technical POC for Web 3D, using Three.js

Miguel Rojas (Design)
Chaotive [Leonardo Montenegro] (Programming and Design)

How to play:

Use the menu on the right of the canvas to control your player.

You can move only 2 times per turn.

After moving, press the "End Turn" button, then you can move again.

The environment you see is really 3D. You can play over it with the mouse.

The map generation is dynamic. If you reload the page you will see the map changes.

That's it.
